Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Sheridan
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Wilson, Clarendon, and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Wilson, Clarendon, and Lawrence due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Sheridan
ShortDescription: Update: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Wilson, Marine Drive, Foster and Sheridan due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Wilson, Marine Drive, Foster and Sheridan due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.
